body: Mike, A new thread would be a good idea.  Sarith and others are more experts on this topic than I but, to briefly answer your question, this is basically what the Honeybee_Generate Custom Sky component does. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/G5vg01YwjqoGTfzKuhSyu4M3lg0q8V9Uv6vSCP5T6fkVRkjd5S5hWPotVF1ZzNU1yp-mQRcg3hrKF3Nv388r6PVfxZ4Qg3uR/CustomSky.PNG) You just plug in your location, diffuse+direct rad, and date+time, and you get a sky that you can use in Honeybee radiation studies. -Crhis
